subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Data from 365 N.C.A.A. Division I men’s games finds that officials tended to make more calls against teams with leads and were more likely to make calls in favor of home teams.
snippet: Data from 365 N.C.A.A. Division I men’s games finds that officials tended to make more calls against teams with leads and were more likely to make calls in favor of home teams.
